title: Hooley's delta function
summary: In mathematics, Hooley's delta function, also called Erd≈ës--Hooley delta-function, is the maximum number of divisors of n {\displaystyle n} in [ u , e u ] {\displaystyle [u,eu]} for all u {\displaystyle u} , where e {\displaystyle e} is the Euler's number.
